devoted.translation[0].definitions[0].de: giving someone or something a lot of love and attention
devoted.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: Isabella was devoted to her brother.
devoted.translation[0].definitions[1].de: dealing with, containing, or being used for only one thing
devoted.translation[0].definitions[2].de: strongly supporting someone or something because you admire or enjoy them
devoted.translation[0].definitions[2].ex: The journal had a devoted following of around 1,000 subscribers.
